document.full_text: the justice department said that it had cleared all department lawyers of wrongdoing in relation to a voter-intimidation case involving the new black panther party, a black-nationalist fringe group.
document.title: washington: agency lawyers cleared in voting case
lines_and_colors: the justice department said that it had cleared all department lawyers of wrongdoing in relation to a voter-intimidation case involving the new black panther party, a black-nationalist fringe group.
